The decimal property 'PARTNER_CODE' on entity type 'AGGR_CODES' does not have a store type specified. This may lead to a precision loss if the values do not fit in the default precision and scale. Oracle recommends to explicitly specify the column type that can accommodate all the values in 'OnModelCreating' using 'HasColumnType', specify precision and scale using 'HasPrecision', or configure a value converter using 'HasConversion'.

A decimal property 'PARTNER_CODE' is part of a key on entity type 'AGGR_CODES' which may lead to a precision loss if the configured precision and scale don't match the column type in the database. Consider using a different property as the key, or make sure that the database column type matches the model configuration.
